title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-server-sitemap
author: Lin Onetwo
name: Sitemap for server
description:
Generate Sitemap for your Nodejs based server.

Use this with your NodeJS based wiki server, or your [[blog served with TidGi|https://tidgi.fun/#TidGi%20Feature%20Handbook%2FBlogging%20With%20NAT%20Traversal]].
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tw-server-sitemap">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tw-server-sitemap"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-server-sitemap/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-server-sitemap/"/></$button>

Generate Contents Links Like:

Sitemap: https://tidgi.fun/sitemap.xml

Robots: https://tidgi.fun/robots.txt
